original_text: Samuel took the horn that was full of olive oil. He poured the oil over David's head to anoint him. Samuel did this in front of David's brothers. From that moment, the Spirit of the Lord came on David with great power.
korean_text: 사무엘이 기름 뿔병을 가져다가 그의 형제 중에서 그에게 부었더니 이 날 이후로 다윗이 여호와의 영에게 크게 감동되니라 사무엘이 떠나서 라마로 가니라

sentences.original_text: that was full of olive oil
He poured the oil over David's head
Samuel did this in front of David's brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘은 다윗의 형제들 앞에서 이렇게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: the Spirit of the Lord came on David
